relationships.description: Dumbledore acknowledges the qualities of Hufflepuff house that Cedric Diggory exemplified.
Dumbledore honors Cedric Diggory by acknowledging his qualities and asking everyone to stand in his memory.
Harry observes Cho crying in the crowd.
